items.sentence: Tom had the time of his life at the party last night.

Think, everyone! Where haven't we looked for Tom yet?
Tom will be watching television if you visit him now.
I don't think I'll ever learn how to ride a unicycle.
We don't have to wear a tie to the office on Fridays.
I can't believe people think that Tom is intelligent.
Tom grew up thinking he needed to eat meat every day.

I think what I said is correct, but I could be wrong.
Tom didn't seem surprised that Mary hadn't done that.

Would you mind giving me a hand with these suitcases?

We're supposed to take off our shoes at the entrance.
